creator: Beghelli
descriptionHtml:
CableCom is an innovative patented management and control system for CableCom Beghelli compatible emergency devices.
With Cablecom Beghelli you can interact directly with each individual emergency lamp through unidirectional optical communication. It is therefore possible to modify the configuration parameters of each individual appliance, start diagnostic tests and perform other advanced functions.
If you want complete control of the centralized "CableCom" system, connect the app to the "CableCom Connect" control unit.
Taking advantage of the plant's WiFi technology, it automatically configures the entire system, starts functional tests and autonomy tests, modifies the parameters of each device and enables advanced features such as the innovative "Infinity Mode" function that allows you to have infinite autonomy on the lamps.
The Cablecom Connect app is the ideal tool for system maintenance procedures: with a simple click you can download the periodic maintenance log in pdf format, ready to be printed or archived.
descriptionShort: Innovative control system for CableCom Beghelli emergency appliance.

appDetails.developerAddress: via Mozzeghine 13/15 , 40053 Valsamoggia loc Monteveglio (BO) - Italy

title: CableCom Connect

container.value: via Mozzeghine 13/15 , 40053 Valsamoggia loc Monteveglio (BO) - Italy

creator: Beghelli
descriptionHtml:
B.connect is the unique app for managing all the control systems of Beghelli lighting or emergency lighting devices.
It allows direct access to NUBe cloud platform, to the control unit or to the single device.

COMMUNICATION WITH THE SINGLE APPLIANCE
B.connect allows you to interact directly with each individual lighting or emergency lighting lamp through the exclusive one-way optical communication.
Directly modify the configuration parameters of the single device, start diagnostic tests and execute commands or advanced configurations.

MANAGE YOUR PLANTS LOCALLY
B.connect allows direct access to Beghelli control units using WiFi technology.
Connect to the "Cablecom Connect", "Logica Connect" and "Logica FM Connect" control units and get complete control of the system: automatically configure the system, start functional tests and autonomy tests, modify the parameters of each device, enable advanced functions and download the latest reports in pdf.

MANAGE YOUR SYSTEMS REMOTELY
B.connect is the gateway to NUBe Beghelli, the cloud platform that allows you to configure, manage, monitor, maintain your lighting and emergency lighting systems.

IN ADDITION YOU CAN MANAGE THE INNOVATIVE AIR SANITIZATION FUNCTIONS
With B.connect you can control the sanitation functions of the emergency appliances of the SanificaAria series.
You can activate or deactivate the sanitation process, set the air fan speed in the uvOxy® sanitation cell and manage the sanitation times based on the environment and needs.

B.connect includes all the features of the "CableCom Connect" app (all "CableCom Connect" control units are compatible with B.connect).

The management of the lighting fixtures will be made available in the second half of 2021
descriptionShort: The gateway to the world of Beghelli connected systems

appDetails.developerAddress: via Mozzeghine 13/15 , 40053 Valsamoggia loc Monteveglio (BO) - Italy
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Added new functions and support for the emergency luminaires of the SanificaAria series
